cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 115 miles southeast of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest toward the middle Texas coast with significant slowing and expected meandering near or just inland of the coast through the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: middle Texas coast (near Corpus Christi–Port O’Connor area)
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: ≥120 (storm not forecast to move offshore near Michigan within 5-day window)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None – all watches confined to south Texas coast and western Gulf
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning Port Mansfield–High Island TX; Hurricane Warning Port Mansfield–Sargent TX; Tropical Storm Warning north of Sargent to High Island TX and south of Port Mansfield to Mouth of Rio Grande
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coast and portions of southwest Louisiana
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Not expected to approach Detroit within forecast window
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no Great-Lakes or Midwest station listed in probability table)
